entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 6:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
